title: Microsoft forced me to switch to Linux
author: bobsterlobster
aiHeadline: Microsoft's latest 'innovation' leaves users with no choice but to flee to Linux, because who needs buggy software and forced updates, right?

title: Amazon cuts 16k jobs
author: DGAP
aiHeadline: Amazon, the king of automation, finally does the one thing robots can't: fire 16,000 humans in a move that's as surprising as a tech giant admitting they're not perfect.

title: ICE and Palantir: US agents using health data to hunt illegal immigrants
author: dberhane
aiHeadline: ICE and Palantir team up to misuse health data, proving once again that the government's idea of 'public health' is more about surveillance than actual care.

title: Please Don't Say Mean Things about the AI I Just Invested a Billion Dollars In
author: randycupertino
aiHeadline: Billionaire begs the world to be nice to their AI, because nothing says 'I'm worth a billion' like throwing a tantrum when people criticize your robot friend.

title: Somebody used spoofed ADSB signals to raster the meme of JD Vance
author: wubin
aiHeadline: Someone decides that spoofing ADSB signals to mock JD Vance is the best use of their time, proving that even in the tech world, there's no shortage of people with too much time and not enough sense.
